attributes.action: ensure that people defending their home from violent burglars are not prosecuted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The law and in particular the CPS (Crown Prosecution Service) seem to bend over backwards to ensure that burglars are protected from householders trying to protect themselves.  Its time this government put in place legislation to ensure this doesn't happen and that its the criminals who are punished

rejection.details: The question of prosecution is a matter for the CPS, not Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
